absence.name: Absence
absence.description: When you manually sneak, recover 1 AP. When you kill a non-summon enemy, you can cast Absence for free until the end of your turn, which applies up to Dazzled II for 2 turns to enemies within 4m, makes you Invisible until the end of your turn, and makes you sneak

abyss.name: Abyss
abyss.description: When you perform a Violent Strike, activate Paucity. This item has no armor

adamant.name: Adamant
adamant.description: After activating Ward, you may cast a second Shields Up skill that costs 2 AP for 1 turn

amaranthinebulwark.name: Amaranthine Bulwark
amaranthinebulwark.description: Your Ward grants an additional +12% Physical resistance (+1% per Inertia embodied)

angelsegg.name: Angel's Egg
angelsegg.description: When you activate Purity, cast a Supernova that only harms enemies. When an ally you can see dies while you have Purity active, as a 1AP reaction, cast this Supernova at its location

antediluviancarapace.name: Antediluvian Carapace
antediluviancarapace.description: +2% (+0.5% per Perseverance) maximum Air, Earth, Fire, and Water resistances

apothecarysguile.name: Apothecary's Guile
apothecarysguile.description: Increase the duration of Poisoned statuses you apply by 1 turn. Once per round, when you perform a basic attack or skill from sneak that directly targets a Poisoned enemy, damage them with a Curare skill that applies up to Weakened II for 2 turns

arcturus.name: Arcturus
arcturus.description: Whenever you perform a Centurion reaction, activate Ward. Your Ward grants an additional +5% to Physical and Piercing resistances

austerity.name: Austerity
austerity.description: +20% Physical and Piercing resistance. At the start of your turn suffer Water damage equal to 25% of your total Vitality

blackglassbrand.name: Blackglass Brand
blackglassbrand.description: When an attack misses you, apply Brittle and up to Vulnerable III for 2 turns to the attacker. Gain +1 free Centurion reaction per round

bloodforge.name: Bloodforge
bloodforge.description: At the start of your turn, restore 25% of your total Physical and Magic Armor, and receive piercing damage equal to 15% of your total Vitality

bountyhunter.name: Bounty Hunter
bountyhunter.description: When you perform a basic attack from stealth, apply Bounty Hunter for 2 turns: -6% all resistances (-1.5% per Scoundrel)

carnality.name: Carnality
carnality.description: +30% Air, Earth, Fire, Water, and Poison resistance At the start of your turn, suffer Piercing damage equal to 15% of your total Vitality

cataclysm.name: Cataclysm
cataclysm.description: Once per round, when you score a critical hit on a Scorched character, cast Supernova

charity.name: Charity
charity.description: When you affect a character with Benevolence, restore 10% (+1% per Inertia and Life embodied) of its total Vitality, Physical Armor, and Magic Armor

consecration.name: Consecration
consecration.description: Once per round, your Celestial reaction targeting an ally applies Soothing Cold for 2 turns, and creates a 2m blessed water surface beneath it

convergence.name: Convergence
convergence.description: When you perform a basic attack on an enemy with Charged, gain +100% accuracy while attacking and a 12% chance, per Charged enemy, to cast Lightning Bolt

coruscatingsilks.name: Coruscating Silks
coruscatingsilks.description: 30% of physical damage suffered is instantly regenerated and suffered instead as Air; if armor is depleted, it cannot be recovered in this way

desperation.name: Desperation
desperation.description: Gain +1% movement speed per 1% of Vitality missing

dominion.name: Dominion
dominion.description: When an enemy you can see becomes Suffocated or Squelched, as a 1 AP reaction apply up to Subjugated III to them for 2 turns

dread.name: Dread
dread.description: Once per round, when an enemy you can see becomes Terrified or Subjugated, gain Dread for 1 turn: +0.3% lifesteal per Strength and your Vitality Void deals additional damage equal to 1% of your total Vitality per Necromancer

drogsluck.name: Drog's Luck
drogsluck.description: While you are Scorched, gain +15% Power and Wits (+4% per Lucky Charm and +2% per Pyrokinetic)

eclipse.name: Eclipse
eclipse.description: When Subjugated III or Terrified III expires naturally on an enemy you can see, as a 1 AP reaction apply Silenced for 2 turns, ignoring armor, to enemies within 5m of them

empyreanvestments.name: Empyrean Vestments
empyreanvestments.description: Instantly restore 5% (+0.75% per Memory over 10) of all damage suffered, up to a maximum of 30%. This restoration cannot occur on Armor if it is depleted

ethertide.name: Ether Tide
ethertide.description: When Slowed III, Subjugated III, or Weakened III is applied to a non-boss enemy you can see, as a 1 AP reaction teleport them to your location and apply up to Squelched III for 2 turns

exaltation.name: Exaltation
exaltation.description: When an ally you can see, who is affected by Leadership but not Blessed, performs a Violent Strike, as a free reaction apply Blessed for 2 turns to them

expedition.name: Expedition
expedition.description: Default attacks with this weapon cost -2 AP. When you perform a basic attack, gain Windrun until the end of the current turn, granting +2.0 movement and +100% movement speed, but -75% damage

eyeofthestorm.name: Eye of the Storm
eyeofthestorm.description: When you become Charged, gain Eye of the Storm for 1 turn: +25% Finesse (+2.5% per Aerotheurge), and once per round, when you perform a Predator reaction, also cast Dazing Bolt

faceofthefallen.name: Face of the Fallen
faceofthefallen.description: Gain "Face of the Fallen" skill, which allows you to destroy corpses to activate your Voracity effects, as well as apply up to Terrified III to enemies within 6m of the corpse

famine.name: Famine
famine.description: Once per round when you trigger Paucity, pay 2 AP to cast Mosquito Swarm on all enemies in a 5m radius around you

fecundity.name: Fecundity
fecundity.description: When a non-summon character you can see dies in combat, as a 1 AP reaction summon a totem at their corpse

fistofdecay.name: Fist of Decay
fistofdecay.description: You may not equip shields. When you perform Sucker Punch, activate Vitality Void and apply up to Vulnerable III for 2 turns to your target

ghostflame.name: Ghostflame
ghostflame.description: Once per round, when you perform an Occultist reaction on an enemy with Vulnerable, remove Vulnerable and apply Epidemic of Fire for 1 turn per tier of Vulnerable removed

giantsskull.name: Giant's Skull
giantsskull.description: 20% of physical damage suffered is instantly regenerated and suffered instead as Earth; if armor is depleted, it cannot be recovered in this way

glacier.name: Glacier
glacier.description: When you detonate Brittle on an enemy, apply up to Slowed II for 2 turns and deal Water damage equivalent to 5% of its total Vitality, to enemies within 5m of it

gluttony.name: Gluttony
gluttony.description: When a non-totem character dies you become up to Slowed II for 1 turn, but gain +4% lifesteal and +10% damage per corpse within 8m of you, for 2 turns

godspeed.name: Godspeed
godspeed.description: When you apply Hasted or Blessed, restore 10% (+3% per 0.25 of your Movement over 2.5) of the target's missing Magic and Physical Armor

goldforge.name: Goldforge
goldforge.description: While you have Prosperity, gain Volatile Armor: Whenever your armor receives damage, deal 30% of Physical Armor lost as Earth, and 30% of Magic Armor lost as Fire, to all other characters within 3m

golem.name: Golem
golem.description: If you have Prosperity active at the end of your turn, suffer damage equal to 90% of your total Vitality, split between Earth and Physical; enemies within 3m of you are similarly damaged, using 40% of your total Vitality

gramswordofgrief.name: Gram, Sword of Grief
gramswordofgrief.description: On the first Poisoned character you hit while performing a basic attack, remove Poisoned and deal Poison and Piercing damage to all characters other than you within 3m of them, both equivalent to the damage that would have been dealt over Poisoned's duration (up to 5 turns)

hibernaculum.name: Hibernaculum
hibernaculum.description: When you hit a Brittle enemy while performing a basic attack, cast Glaciate on them

impetus.name: Impetus
impetus.description: When you Haste an enemy, apply Impetus to them for X turns, where X is the duration of Hasted; when an enemy you can see becomes Hasted, do the same as a 1 AP reaction. Impetus deals Air damage, similar to Ruptured Tendons, when the afflicted character moves

infernalcontract.name: Infernal Contract
infernalcontract.description: Once per enemy, per round, when you damage a Bleeding enemy that is not Withered, remove Bleeding and apply Withered for 2 turns

ironmaiden.name: Iron Maiden
ironmaiden.description: 15% of magic damage suffered is instantly regenerated and suffered instead as physical; if armor is depleted, it cannot be recovered in this way

judgement.name: Judgement
judgement.description: Once per round when you perform a Violent Strike, also perform the following based on your highest of these Attributes: Finesse, Fan of Knives; Memory, Glaciate; Strength, Whirlwind; Wits, Ignition. If multiple Attributes share the highest value, perform each of their effects

kudzu.name: Kudzu
kudzu.description: When you or your summons explode a corpse, apply Poisoned for 2 turns to yourself. Then apply Poisoned and up to Slowed III for 2 turns to other characters within 5m of the corpse. While Poisoned gain +10% Earth, +20% Poison, and +10% Physical resistance

lambentblade.name: Lambent Blade
lambentblade.description: When you hit an enemy while performing a basic attack: if it is Bleeding, apply Brittle for 1 turn; if it is Charged, apply Scorched for 1 turn; if it is Poisoned, apply Calcifying for 1 turn

leper.name: Leper
leper.description: When you or your summons score a critical hit, apply up to Vulnerable II to yourself and the target for 1 turn

leviathan.name: Leviathan
leviathan.description: While Wet, gain +0.5 movement. When you perform a Violent Strike: Source Infusion 1: Teleport each non-boss enemy within 7m to a position nearest you where they can stand, and apply Wet to them and yourself for 3 turns

lightspire.name: Lightspire
lightspire.description: When you spend Source with at least 2 enemies within 5m of you, fire a Lightning Bolt at each of them

malice.name: Malice
malice.description: When you Source Infuse a skill while Scorched, it is considered infused with one more point--if you are capable of infusing at that amount--but you suffer 65% of your total Vitality and armors as Fire damage

malleusmaleficarum.name: Malleus Maleficarum
malleusmaleficarum.description: When a character you can see casts a Necromancy spell, cast Dazing Bolt on them as a 1 AP reaction

mirage.name: Mirage
mirage.description: When you dodge an attack, teleport behind the attacker, become Invisible until the end of its turn, and attempt to Sneak

misery.name: Misery
misery.description: Whenever Vulnerable is applied to you, apply 2 Battered, and then up to Vulnerable III for 2 turns, to all enemies within 4m. When you become Poisoned, apply Vulnerable I to yourself for 1 turn

momentum.name: Momentum
momentum.description: When you perform a basic attack: Source Infusion 1: Fire a piercing projectile per 0.75 movement you have, each dealing 10% of weapon damage

mountain.name: Mountain
mountain.description: When an un-Taunted enemy you can see scores a critical hit, or damages an allied character to 15% (+1.5% per your Strength) Vitality or less, as a 1 AP reaction, apply Taunted for 1 turn to them

necromancersraiment.name: Necromancer's Raiment
necromancersraiment.description: When an enemy you can see becomes Withered, as a 1 AP reaction, summon a corpse beneath them

nemesis.name: Nemesis
nemesis.description: When you attack a boss-type creature, you have a 7% chance for each tier of tiered statuses on it to activate Violent Strike

nightmare.name: Nightmare
nightmare.description: When a character you can see dies, as a 1 AP reaction, apply up to Terrified III (or up to Terrified II if it was a summon) for 2 turns to enemies within 5m of it. Then gain +5% Power per tier of Terrified on enemies in combat with you for 1 turn

nihility.name: Nihility
nihility.description: When you apply Terrified III, Vulnerable III, or Weakened III to an enemy, activate Vitality Void

obelisk.name: Obelisk
obelisk.description:
Unlock Staff of Magus Source Infusions:
1: Also target enemies you can see within 2.5m of the primary target.
2: Also target enemies you can see within 13m and apply Dazzled II for 2 turns

occam.name: Occam
occam.description: While performing a basic attack, when you hit an enemy with 15% Vitality or less (7.5% for bosses), it dies. Source Infusion 1: Extend this effect to 30% Vitality (11% for bosses). Source Infusion 2: Extend this effect to 50% Vitality (15% for bosses)

onslaught.name: Onslaught
onslaught.description: When a non-summon enemy dies, gain Onslaught for 2 turns, granting +3% Power and Finesse per 0.2 movement over 2.0

ouroboros.name: Ouroboros
ouroboros.description: When you damage yourself, instantly restore half that amount as Vitality

paragon.name: Paragon
paragon.description: Your Vitality Void now activates on non-summon allies instead of yourself, using their Vitality, and dealing 25% (+4% per Leadership) of its damage, up to 65%. After moving 3 or more stacks of Battered or Harried via Benevolence in a round, activate Vitality Void

pariah.name: Pariah
pariah.description: When you become Battered or Harried, gain Pariah for 1 turn, granting +4.5% Constitution per stack of Battered and +4.5% Power per stack of Harried

pestilence.name: Pestilence
pestilence.description: When Poisoned ends on an enemy you can see, as a 1 AP reaction, apply Poisoned for 2 turns to it. When you apply Poisoned, deal Piercing damage and apply Bleeding for 2 turns to enemies within 2m of that target

prismaticbarrier.name: Prismatic Barrier
prismaticbarrier.description: While Prosperity is active, gain +3% elemental resistance per Perseverance

prophecy.name: Prophecy
prophecy.description: When you become Prepared, recover 1 more AP, and for 1 turn gain +3% dodge per Telekinesis and +0.25% dodge per initiative

pyre.name: Pyre
pyre.description: When you or your summons explode a corpse, grant the Firebrand aura (as-per the Firebrand skill) for 2 turns to whoever exploded it

rapture.name: Rapture
rapture.description: Once per round, when you perform a Celestial reaction, activate Purity; or, if Purity has remaining cooldown duration, remove one turn from it instead

redorison.name: Red Orison
redorison.description: When an ally performs a Celestial reaction on an ally you can see, as a 1AP reaction, apply Blessed for 2 turns to that target. When an ally performs an Occultist reaction on an enemy you can see, as a 1AP reaction, apply Cursed for 2 turns to that target

rodofabeyance.name: Rod of Abeyance
rodofabeyance.description: When you activate Abeyance, apply up to Weakened II for 2 turns to enemies within 5m. When you abey 60% or more of your total Vitality, your reactions do not cost AP while Abeyance is active

rodofcommand.name: Rod of Command
rodofcommand.description: When you perform a Violent Strike on an enemy with Ataxia, apply up to Subjugated III for 2 turns

rodofconviction.name: Rod of Conviction
rodofconviction.description: When you perform Shields Up, gain Volatile Armor for 2 turns: When damaged, deal physical damage equivalent to 50% of the physical armor lost, to characters within 3m

salamander.name: Salamander
salamander.description: 20% of physical damage suffered is instantly regenerated and suffered instead as Fire; if armor is depleted, it cannot be recovered in this way

seraph.name: Seraph
seraph.description: Gain +1 free Celestial reaction per round. Your Celestial reactions on allies grant +1 turn of Source generation to the target

serenity.name: Serenity
serenity.description: When you activate Purity, remove all tiered statuses from yourself. Then restore 15% of your Vitality and armors

silkclimb.name: Silkclimb
silkclimb.description: When you receive damage exceeding 20% of your total Vitality, create a 3m web surface on yourself, applying up to Slowed II to characters within, and teleport up to 4m away from the damage source, to a valid location you can see

smother.name: Smother
smother.description: When you manually sneak, recover 1 AP. When performing basic attacks from Sneak, apply up to Subjugated III for 2 turns, to enemies you hit

thebutchersdisciple.name: The Butcher's Disciple
thebutchersdisciple.description: When your offhand is free, gain 1% Critical Chance per Strength over ten

thebutcherswill.name: The Butcher's Will
thebutcherswill.description: When you perform a Violent strike, deal irresistible Physical damage equivalent to 10% (+0.35% per Strength over 10) of the target's current Vitality. This damage is halved against boss-type enemies

thecannibal.name: The Cannibal
thecannibal.description: When you perform a basic attack on an ally, apply Feast to them and yourself for 3 turns. Feast grants +5% damage and +2% lifesteal per character with Feast. As a 1 AP reaction at the end of their turn, characters with Feast cast Mosquito Swarm on the nearest character they can see within 13m, spreading Feast if it is an ally

thechthonian.name: The Chthonian
thechthonian.description: When you perform a basic attack, you have a 15% chance (+1% per Strength over 10) to also deal 60% of weapon damage in a 25 degree, 10m long cone

thecrucible.name: The Crucible
thecrucible.description: When you cast Corpse Explosion, apply Immolation for 2 turns to characters within 4m of your target

thejaguar.name: The Jaguar
thejaguar.description: At the start of each round, gain +3 Initiative per Bleeding enemy. Your Bleeding statuses deal double damage. While sneaking, gain +2 movement and +2 AP maximum

thelocustcrown.name: The Locust Crown
thelocustcrown.description: Whenever an enemy you can see becomes Withered, apply Corroding for 1 turn to them as a free reaction

thesavage.name: The Savage
thesavage.description: When you perform a basic attack with 3 or more enemies within 4m of you, also perform a Whirlwind You suffer a -1 penalty (or -2 for Lone Wolves) to Aerotheurge, Geomancer, Hydrosophist, Necromancer, Pyrokinetic, and Summoning

thevault.name: The Vault
thevault.description: Whenever you have at least 3 AP as a combat round begins (before your turn), gain 1 turn of Source Generation. When gaining a Source point, restore 0.75% of total Physical Armor per Strength and 0.75% of total Magic Armor per Memory

thirst.name: Thirst
thirst.description: Once during any action, when you score a critical hit on a Bleeding enemy, recover 1 AP and lose 1 Constitution for 1 turn. This penalty stacks, and its duration resets upon stacking

thornhalo.name: Thorn Halo
thornhalo.description: 15% of magic damage suffered is instantly regenerated and suffered instead as piercing; if armor is depleted, it cannot be recovered in this way

trample.name: Trample
trample.description: Increase the duration of Bleeding statuses you apply by 1 turn. After using a "rush"-type skill, apply to enemies within 3m: 1 Battered per Bleeding enemy hit during the rush, and up to Ataxia III

tundra.name: Tundra
tundra.description: 20% of physical damage suffered is instantly regenerated and suffered instead as Water; if armor is depleted, it cannot be recovered in this way

urgency.name: Urgency
urgency.description: For the first 30 seconds of your turn, you have +0.3 movement and +10% damage per Force embodied; gain 7 more seconds whenever you use a skill

vertigo.name: Vertigo
vertigo.description: +20% invested Finesse. When you perform a basic attack, apply Drunk to yourself for 1 turn. While Drunk, each point of Finesse over ten grants +1% more dodge but -0.5% accuracy

vortex.name: Vortex
vortex.description: Once per round, when you activate Vitality Void and no targets are hit by it, it instead hits the nearest enemy you can see within 8m. Then, if that enemy is not a boss, try to teleport it to a position nearest you where it can stand. If Paucity is not active for you, pay 15% of your total Vitality to activate this effect

wendigo.name: Wendigo
wendigo.description: Gain +1 free Predator reaction per round. Whenever you hit a Brittle target during a Predator reaction, apply up to Ataxia III for 2 turns, then cause Brittle to detonate

wintersgrasp.name: Winter's Grasp
wintersgrasp.description: Once per round, when you hit a Brittle enemy while performing a basic attack, remove surfaces within 3m of it and create ice in that space. Then shatter the ice (as per the "Shatter" spell, ~50% of its damage)

wraith.name: Wraith
wraith.description: Once while performing a basic attack, when you hit, recover 1 AP and teleport behind a random enemy (excluding this target) you can see within 8m. Basic attacks can never cost less than 2AP

zeal.name: Zeal
zeal.description: When you perform All In or Flurry, recover 2AP. Then perform basic attacks, each recovering half their cost, randomly targeting characters within range until you no longer have sufficient AP. Basic attacks can never cost less than 2AP

zenith.name: Zenith
zenith.description: When you hit an enemy while performing a basic attack, you have a 30% chance to launch a Fireball at it

zodiac.name: Zodiac
zodiac.description: When you perform a Celestial reaction, emulate the effects of Chain Lightning on that target. When an ally performs a Celestial reaction on a target you can see, do the same as a free reaction
